AT.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
AT.description: In BYE-BYE BOXBOY! dreht sich alles um die Hauptfigur Qbby und seine Fähigkeit, Blöcke herzustellen, die er zum Schutz, zum Erreichen hoch gelegener Orte sowie zum Betätigen von Schaltern nutzen kann. Jeder Level besteht aus einigen Rätseln, so dass man den Dreh schnell heraushat! Neu in BYE-BYE BOXBOY!: Spezial-Blöcke und Geleit-Phasen, in denen Qbby einen anderen Charakter zum Ende des Levels begleiten muss. Außerdem werden amiibo unterstützt! Unter amiibo.nintendo.eu findest du eine Liste kompatibler amiibo™ und aktuelle Informationen. Um amiibo auf Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- und Nintendo 2DS-Systemen zu benutzen, wird ein Nintendo 3DS-NFC-Lese-/Schreibgerät benötigt.

AU.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
AU.description: BYE-BYE BOXBOY! revolves around the main character Qbby’s ability to create boxes, which he can use to protect himself, to reach higher places or to activate switches. Each level consists of a few puzzles, which makes the game easy to pick up! BYE-BYE BOXBOY! introduces special boxes and escort phases where Qbby must lead another character to the end of the level. It includes amiibo support too! Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BG.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
BG.description: BYE-BYE BOXBOY! revolves around the main character Qbby’s ability to create boxes, which he can use to protect himself, to reach higher places or to activate switches. Each level consists of a few puzzles, which makes the game easy to pick up! BYE-BYE BOXBOY! introduces special boxes and escort phases where Qbby must lead another character to the end of the level. It includes amiibo support too! Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BE.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
BE.description: BYE-BYE BOXBOY! repose sur la capacité du personnage principal, Qbby, à créer des blocs, qu'il utilise pour se protéger, atteindre des endroits élevés ou encore activer des interrupteurs. Chaque niveau est constitué de quelques énigmes, rendant le jeu facile à prendre en main ! BYE-BYE BOXBOY! introduit des blocs spéciaux et des phases d'escorte où Qbby devra guider un autre personnage jusqu'à la fin du niveau. Vous pouvez également utiliser les amiibo ! Visitez le site amiibo.nintendo.eu pour voir la liste des amiibo™ compatibles et en savoir plus. Un lecteur/enregistreur NFC est nécessaire pour utiliser les amiibo avec les consoles Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL et Nintendo 2DS.

movies.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!: Bande- annonce de lancement

ES.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
ES.description: BYE-BYE BOXBOY! gira en torno a la habilidad de Qbby, el personaje principal, de crear cajas que puede utilizar para protegerse, alcanzar lugares elevados o encender interruptores. Cada nivel consiste en varios puzles, lo que hace que el juego sea fácil de captar. BYE-BYE BOXBOY! presenta cajas especiales y fases de escolta en las que Qbby debe guiar a otro personaje hasta el final del nivel. ¡También es compatible con amiibo! Visita amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar la lista de amiibo™ compatibles y la información más reciente. El lector/grabador de NFC para Nintendo 3DS estará disponible más adelante este año.

IT.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
IT.description: BYE-BYE BOXBOY! si basa sull'abilità del protagonista Qbby di creare blocchi, che può usare per proteggersi, raggiungere punti sopraelevati o attivare degli interruttori. Ogni livello è composto da vari enigmi, il che rende il gioco semplice da imparare. BYE-BYE BOXBOY! introduce blocchi speciali e situazioni in cui Qbby deve condurre un altro personaggio alla fine del livello. Supporto amiibo incluso! Consulta il sito amiibo.nintendo.eu per maggiori dettagli sugli amiibo™ compatibili e informazioni aggiornate. Per usare gli amiibo con la console Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS è necessario un lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS. Il lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS sarà disponibile quest'anno.

NL.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
NL.description: BYE-BYE BOXBOY! Draait om de vaardigheid van het hoofdpersonage Qbby om kisten te maken, die hij kan gebruiken om hemzelf te beschermen, om hoger gelegen plekken te bereiken, of om schakelaars te activeren. Ieder level bestaat uit een aantal puzzels, waardoor het makkelijk is om het spel op te pikken! BYE-BYE BOXBOY! introduceert speciale kisten en escortfases waarbij Qbby een ander personage naar het einde van het level moet loodsen. Het ondersteund ook amiibo! Kijk op amiibo.nintendo.eu voor compatibele amiibo™ en de meest recente informatie. Om amiibo te gebruiken op Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- en/of Nintendo 2DS-systemen is een NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS nodig. De NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS zal later dit jaar beschikbaar komen.

NZ.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
NZ.description: BYE-BYE BOXBOY! revolves around the main character Qbby’s ability to create boxes, which he can use to protect himself, to reach higher places or to activate switches. Each level consists of a few puzzles, which makes the game easy to pick up! BYE-BYE BOXBOY! introduces special boxes and escort phases where Qbby must lead another character to the end of the level. PT.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
PT.description: No jogo BYE-BYE BOXBOY!, a personagem principal Qbby tem de criar caixas, que pode usar para se proteger, alcançar pontos mais altos do cenário ou ativar interruptores. Cada nível tem alguns quebra-cabeças e é muito fácil começar a jogar! BYE-BYE BOXBOY! introduz caixas especiais e secções onde o Qbby terá de acompanhar outra personagem até ao fim do nível. O título também é compatível com amiibo! Aceda a amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar a lista de amiibo™ compatíveis e as informações mais recentes. Para usar os amiibo com as Consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS, é necessário um leitor/gravador de NFC Nintendo 3DS.

RU.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!™
RU.description: Игра BYE-BYE BOXBOY! основана на способности главного персонажа Qbby создавать коробки, чтобы защищаться, добираться до высоких мест или активировать переключатели. Каждый уровень состоит из нескольких головоломок, поэтому играть в нее может любой! В игре BYE-BYE BOXBOY! появились особые коробки и этапы сопровождения, где задача Qbby — довести другой персонаж до конца уровня. Игра также поддерживает amiibo! Посетите amiibo.nintendo.eu для получения информации о совместимых amiibo™ и прочей актуальной информации. Чтобы использовать amiibo с системами Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL или Nintendo 2DS, необходимо устройство чтения/записи NFC для Nintendo 3DS.

movies.name: BYE-BYE BOXBOY!: трейлер к выходу игры
